summary: Email correspondence from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York to a records specialist, discussing a follow-up call about subpoenas for student records and providing a trial subpoena attachment. The communication is part of preparations for potential testimony in a trial.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District Of New York
persons.context: The sender of the email, coordinating with a records specialist regarding subpoenas for student records and a potential trial subpoena.

events.title: Follow-up Call Regarding Subpoenas
events.description: A call took place between a federal prosecutor and a records specialist to discuss subpoenas for student records, with further coordination planned for late October.
personsInvolved: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District Of New York
Specialist Student Records & Subpoenas Information Technology Enterprise Applications/Records Management

locations: 1 Saint Andrews Plaza New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: A federal prosecutor from the Southern District of New York is actively pursuing student records via subpoena for a trial.
A trial subpoena was issued on September 15, 2021, and attached to the email correspondence.
The records specialist is being prepared for potential testimony, with logistics to be discussed in late October 2021.
The communication indicates an ongoing legal proceeding requiring student records as evidence.
